typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as long,
		runtime as long,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as long,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviePQ
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieForthCoffee
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdel
MovieForthCoffee select(mapColumn(
		MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate
	)) ~> Select1
MoviePQ select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = id,
		MovieTitle = title,
		MovieCategory = genre,
		MovieRating = rating,
		availabilityDate,
		MovieRunTimeMin = runtime
	)) ~> Select2
